BR_text.BRsummary: Can not stop the job by using rest API
BR_text.BRdescription:
When I use rest API to stop my job, though the response code is 202 and data is ''{"message":"execute job autoML_2018-07-18_10-57-06 successfully"}", the job in web portal is still running.
 This is my code:
 response = self.http.request(
             'PUT',
             self.rest_server_socket + 'jobs/' + job_name + '/executionType',
             headers={
                 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token,
             },
             body=json.dumps({'value': 'STOP'}),
         )
         if response.status == 202:
             print(response.data)
             return True
         else:
             print(response.status, response.data)
             return False
 And this is my job url.
 <denchmark-link:http://10.151.40.179/view.html?jobName=autoML_2018-07-18_10-57-06>http://10.151.40.179/view.html?jobName=autoML_2018-07-18_10-57-06</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text: I have solved this issue by adding 'Content-Type': 'application/json' to the request header. However, when I check the rest server log and launcher log, I found that although the parameter can not be interpreted correctly, the launcher and rest server still return true. So, I think it's better to return false if the parameter can not be interpreted.

comments_1.comment_text: Will add parameter validation to this controller.
